description: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n >= 2} (K(n)/n!), where K(n) is A002034.
references: I. Cojocaru and S. Cojocaru, The Second Constant of Smarandache, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 7, No. 1-2-3, 1996, 119-120.
links: C. Ashbacher, Smarandache Sequences, Stereograms and Series,Hexis (2005)
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Smarandache Constants
author: Charles T. Le (charlestle(AT)yahoo.com)
extensions: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 13 2006
